[{"id":"JT-48410","entityId":"25-2057767","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48410"},{"name":"summary","value":"Blinking query-assist suggest popup on edit forms"},{"name":"description","value":"

Query assist is almost unusable on

  1. create board form
  2. edit saved-search form
  3. edit teamcity-integration form
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1532368310120"},{"name":"updated","value":"1532609190106"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"maksimrv"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksim Ryzhikov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Ekaterina_Zaikina"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Ekaterina Zaikina"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Core Functionality"],"valueId":["Core Functionality"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 72","id":"YouTrack:sprint 72"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-48288","entityId":"25-2051260","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48288"},{"name":"summary","value":"Merge duplicated events on client side"},{"name":"description","value":"

In YTB-422 there is 2 events for linking this issue with another one. This can be reproduced locally with debugging backend.

Since fix this events on the backend is extremely expensive. We decided:

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1531812423690"},{"name":"updated","value":"1532608058581"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"maksimrv"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksim Ryzhikov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Alexey.Volkov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Alexey Volkov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"3"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JT-48163","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"YTB-731","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 72","id":"YouTrack:sprint 72"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2957286","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-48288","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Merge all items from one person in a row
No collapsing exept description/summary changings
Zeplin: https://zpl.io/2vYNy6j

Don't make any settings, about collapsing, we have only one mode on this time

Anisimov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

How item selection should work?

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1529484479089,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2919033","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Alexander Anisimov I think we should select every single item. It's important for spent time items because we have actions on them.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1529488128367,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2963691","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Don't make any settings, we have only one mode on this time

@Dmitry Gizatov why do you want to remove all settings?
Oldest first and Newest first are about the order and of course shouldn't be removed.
Copy link on stream is about sharing information in a stream.

In case you want to remove Collapse issue option we should show all description changes expanded.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532031794731,"updated":1532032018804,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964051","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Alexander Anisimov sorry for misleading, I talk only about collapsing.

we should show all description changes expanded.


We shouldn't collapse all changing with the exception of summary and description changing. Because it's too big, and often do not very helpful.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532071901066,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964217","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
We shouldn't collapse all changing with the exception of summary and description changing. Because it's too big, and often do not very helpful

Dmitry Gizatov you still have collapsed items in a stream.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532078134668,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964229","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Alexander Anisimov it's only for description and summary changes because diff can be very big.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532078325600,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964432","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Dmitry Gizatov I'm asking about it because of feedback from JT-46460 (check out the third image).

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532083519056,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964462","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Alexander Anisimov yap, I know this. If compare one click on details and 10 lines description, I'll choose one click. Plus, in current realisation, you need one click on details and another on three dots, and it's a bug. And also description diff in the current state sometimes looks unreadable.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532084002028,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964490","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Dmitry Gizatov OK. May we also should consider to change the presentation of our Diff component.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532084286618,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964521","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Alexander Anisimov Sure, I have a task for it JT-43813
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532084809349,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"JT-46057","entityId":"25-1881434","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"46057"},{"name":"summary","value":"New UI: "Load more" is irritating for issues with many comments"},{"name":"description","value":"
Recently YouTrack has changed how comment paging works. Before the change I was able to quickly access last comments, read them, and reply. Now I have to click "Load more" until I finally access the desired comment. More over, the issue doesn't remember I clicked "Load more" several times, and next time I visit this page I will clicking again. Could you please fix such behavior and provide quick access to last comments as old YouTrack had?

Demo issue https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/JRE-526
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1519987891543"},{"name":"updated","value":"1532345178666"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"pavel.nikitin"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Pavel Nikitin"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"kb"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Konstantin Bulenkov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"4"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-922","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"JT-45884","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"JT-48372","type":"Depend","role":"depends on"},{"value":"YTB-922","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"xi-eye","fullName":"Alexander Anisimov"}]},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Usability Problem"],"valueId":["Usability Problem"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Major"],"valueId":["Major"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 72","id":"YouTrack:sprint 72"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image1520263567002.png","id":"74-499285","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/image1520263567002.png?file=74-499285&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2731102","author":"mazine","authorFullName":"Maxim Mazin","issueId":"JT-46057","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Dmitry Gizatov, @Maksim Ryzhikov, @Alexander Anisimov: I guess in «oldest first» mode "load more" should be on the top and should load older comments.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1520263498436,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"YouTrack Team","markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2731107","author":"mazine","authorFullName":"Maxim Mazin","issueId":"JT-46057","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Konstantin Bulenkov Please try ‘Newest first’ mode. It's not a complete solution for this issue but a sort of workaround that can help you.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1520263574232,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2963760","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-46057","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Pavel Nikolaev can we do here the same as on MPS UI? Show the last 100 items?

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532041574757,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"youtrack-developers","markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964066","author":"maksimrv","authorFullName":"Maksim Ryzhikov","issueId":"JT-46057","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Alexander Anisimov I think it relates to the issue JT-46387

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1532000895458"},{"name":"updated","value":"1532341742189"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Anna.Zhdan"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Anna Zhdan"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"maksimrv"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Maksim Ryzhikov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JT-45884","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"YTB-731","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 72","id":"YouTrack:sprint 72"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image1.png","id":"74-546851","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/image1.png?file=74-546851&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-48243","entityId":"25-2049112","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48243"},{"name":"summary","value":"Activity stream loaders are not flashing while waiting to start receiving response"},{"name":"description","value":"

2018.2.43478

tl;dr any activity stream tab won't flash during Waiting phase of request to backend (in terms of HAR / network monitor).

STR:

  1. Open any SIV
  2. Toggle off activity stream history tab.
  3. Throttle activity stream endpoint for that issue down to 10bps
  4. Switch activity stream history on.

Expected result: history activity stream icon starts flashing shortly.
Actual result: you have to wait for a long time until history icon starts flashing. See attached screencap: it starts to flash after about 1 minute of wait.

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1531492789051"},{"name":"updated","value":"1532341742152"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Anna.Zhdan"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Anna Zhdan"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"rekolobov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Roman Kolobov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-731","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Verified by","value":[{"value":"rekolobov","fullName":"Roman Kolobov"}]},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 72","id":"YouTrack:sprint 72"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"video.mp4","id":"74-545120","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/video.mp4?file=74-545120&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-48203","entityId":"25-2046151","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48203"},{"name":"summary","value":"Live-update on sprint change shows removed field"},{"name":"description","value":"
  1. go to activity stream with enabled history
  2. change sprint of the issue by applying a command

AR: activity stream gets a new entry about sprint change
ER: this entry is duplicated + the first one has [Remove field] title

{"id":"JT-47780","entityId":"25-2026938","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47780"},{"name":"summary","value":"Show diff details in a history view is not shown in case it's the first item with the following expand control [...]"},{"name":"description","value":"
If the history item contains ...(triple dot) button and i click on Details - they are not expanding.
For example try to expand details of first history item on this issue DTRC-25281

STR:

  1. Open new FSI with changes (it should contains Summary changed: Details and show more changes button)
  2. Expand Details
    AR: nothing will happen (there is no details).
    N.B. click on "show more changes button" and then click on Details -- it works

temporary workaround: click on show more changes button (triple dot) and then expand Details

2 No need to show preview for deleted attachments
3 Added attachment need to show on the next line after title "Attachments"
